overview.en: Litecash (CASH) is the first cryptocurrency that prioritizes user experience. Our goal is to create the most user-friendly wallet. Litecash is open source, peer-to-peer digital cash. Our mission is to achieve mass adoption with real-world use cases on mobile.
overview.zh: Litecash (CASH) 是第一个优先用户体验的加密货币，旨在创建最人性化的点对点开源数字钱包。其使命是通过手机移动端实现大规模现实应用。
